Location permission is nedded to detect transaction coordinates. Click Next, and allow access to location data.
Create a transaction with the payment of interest on the loan?
"Read SMS" permission nedded to import SMS. Click Next, and allow access to messages data.

Backups are creates automatically and stores on the memory card in the Fingen/\Backup
Restore the database from a file? The program will be restarted.

Tab that will be open when the application starts
In the presence of markers specified in autocreate prerequisites
Compare account balance with balance in SMS
Disable PIN protection before change PIN length
On this screen you can change the properties of a transaction. A transaction is any movement of your money (income, expense or transfer)
Click to change the date of the transaction
Click to change the time of the transaction
Select an account, which receives funds
Please select the account from which the funds are debited
Select an account, which receives funds
Enter the payee. Swipe left to go to the transfer mode between your accounts
Enter the payer. Swipe left to go to the transfer mode between your accounts
Select an account for depositing funds. Swipe right to go to the income/expense mode
Choose category of transaction from list
Enter the amount of the transaction
Change the type of transaction - Income/Expense

When transferring funds between accounts in different currencies, it is displayed in the currency of the sum of the destination account. When you edit amount it automatically changes currency exchange rate
If you change the exchange rate, will automatically change the amount in the currency of the destination account
На этом экране изменяются свойства счета
Enter a unique name for the account
Click to call currency choice dialog. In the same dialog you can create a new currency
Enter the name of the bank (not necessarily)
Enter the last 4 digits of the card number (not required)
Check, if you want to hide the account from the list. You need to uncheck the option Show closed accounts in the preferences

Thank you for your purchase! To build graphical reports, go to the "Transactions" tab, pull up the bottom panel and click charting. Reports are based on the transactions displayed in the list, taking into account all of the filters.
Camera access is required to display the camera preview
Permission is not available. Requesting camera permission
You can edit credentials later it preferences

For the ability to download a list of products from the receipt:

    1. Install the application "Проверка касcового чека" (author of АО ГНИВЦ).

    2. Register in it using your mobile phone number and get the code by SMS.

    3. Enter the phone number and code in the form below.

    4. Tap "Save".
